Comments.UseMockServices: Set to true for GitHub Pages deployment (static hosting only). Set to false when you have a real backend API.
Comments.UseApiGateway: Set to true for production to use API Gateway. Set to false to call services directly.
Comments.BaseUrl: Direct service URL - not used when UseApiGateway is true.
Comments.ApiGatewayUrl: The API Gateway URL for production routing. Not used when UseMockServices is true.
